Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring advertisements to disclose the use of synthetic media
Summary: Requires advertisements to disclose the use of synthetic media; imposes a $1,000 civil penalty for a first violation and a $5,000 penalty for any subsequent violation.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring advertisements to disclose the use of synthetic media
